41 // Class ConvexMeshShape

148 
149 // Return the number of bytes used by the collision shape
150 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE size_t ConvexMeshShape::getSizeInBytes() const {
151  return sizeof(ConvexMeshShape);
152 }
153 
154 // Return the scaling vector
155 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const Vector3& ConvexMeshShape::getScale() const {
156  return mScale;
157 }
158 
159 // Set the scale
162 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void ConvexMeshShape::setScale(const Vector3& scale) {
163  mScale = scale;
164  recalculateBounds();
165  notifyColliderAboutChangedSize();
166 }
167 
168 // Return the local bounds of the shape in x, y and z directions
173 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE void ConvexMeshShape::getLocalBounds(Vector3& min, Vector3& max) const {
174  min = mMinBounds;
175  max = mMaxBounds;
176 }
177 
178 // Return the local inertia tensor of the collision shape.
181 
184 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getLocalInertiaTensor(decimal mass) const {
185  const decimal factor = (decimal(1.0) / decimal(3.0)) * mass;
186  const Vector3 realExtent = decimal(0.5) * (mMaxBounds - mMinBounds);
187  assert(realExtent.x > 0 && realExtent.y > 0 && realExtent.z > 0);
188  const decimal xSquare = realExtent.x * realExtent.x;
189  const decimal ySquare = realExtent.y * realExtent.y;
190  const decimal zSquare = realExtent.z * realExtent.z;
191  return Vector3(factor * (ySquare + zSquare), factor * (xSquare + zSquare), factor * (xSquare + ySquare));
192 }
193 
194 // Return the number of faces of the polyhedron
195 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 ConvexMeshShape::getNbFaces() const {
196  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getNbFaces();
197 }
198 
199 // Return a given face of the polyhedron
200 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure::Face& ConvexMeshShape::getFace(uint32 faceIndex) const {
201  assert(faceIndex < getNbFaces());
202  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getFace(faceIndex);
203 }
204 
205 // Return the number of vertices of the polyhedron
206 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 ConvexMeshShape::getNbVertices() const {
207  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getNbVertices();
208 }
209 
210 // Return a given vertex of the polyhedron
211 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure::Vertex& ConvexMeshShape::getVertex(uint32 vertexIndex) const {
212  assert(vertexIndex < getNbVertices());
213  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getVertex(vertexIndex);
214 }
215 
216 // Return the number of half-edges of the polyhedron
217 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE uint32 ConvexMeshShape::getNbHalfEdges() const {
218  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getNbHalfEdges();
219 }
220 
221 // Return a given half-edge of the polyhedron
222 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE const HalfEdgeStructure::Edge& ConvexMeshShape::getHalfEdge(uint32 edgeIndex) const {
223  assert(edgeIndex < getNbHalfEdges());
224  return mPolyhedronMesh->getHalfEdgeStructure().getHalfEdge(edgeIndex);
225 }
226 
227 // Return the position of a given vertex
228 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getVertexPosition(uint32 vertexIndex) const {
229  assert(vertexIndex < getNbVertices());
230  return mPolyhedronMesh->getVertex(vertexIndex) * mScale;
231 }
232 
233 // Return the normal vector of a given face of the polyhedron
234 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getFaceNormal(uint32 faceIndex) const {
235  assert(faceIndex < getNbFaces());
236  return mPolyhedronMesh->getFaceNormal(faceIndex);
237 }
238 
239 // Return the centroid of the polyhedron
240 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE Vector3 ConvexMeshShape::getCentroid() const {
241  return mPolyhedronMesh->getCentroid() * mScale;
242 }
243 
244 
245 // Compute and return the volume of the collision shape
246 RP3D_FORCE_INLINE decimal ConvexMeshShape::getVolume() const {
247  return mPolyhedronMesh->getVolume();
248 }
249 
250 }
251
